name: ARehab
tagline: ARehab is a freeware software for physical rehab, aided by augmented reality technologies and user tracking systems, such as Microsoft Kinect v2.
body:
# ARehab
ARehab is a freeware software for physical rehab, aided by Augmented Reality technologies and user tracking systems, such as Microsoft Kinect v2. It was created during 2015 as a final project at the University of Granada and the aim of this project is to serve as a physical rehab system that will be usefull for medics and physical trainers. It's based on different technologies such as Augmented Reality, Kinect SDK v2, Qt SDK 5 (OpenSource), OpenGL, ... and it's wroten in C++.

![ARehab screenshot 001]https://drive.google.com/file/d/0BwCMaGFBerAaM2tDSFhXQkNvSXdieFoxLUtwajJReVh0MVVv/view?usp=sharing).
![ARehab screenshot 002]https://drive.google.com/file/d/0BwCMaGFBerAadGVCbVBvQ3BZTm5aQVNqX05jeUVoeFJtUWRJ/view?usp=sharing).
![ARehab screenshot 003]https://drive.google.com/file/d/0BwCMaGFBerAaTEVxWE1xeENQSTYyTmhmUUgwenpoNkZUTEY0/view?usp=sharing).
![ARehab screenshot 004]https://drive.google.com/file/d/0BwCMaGFBerAaSW50X3gxSTgwUUJwTWZSYl9JcTR1aWcxSENB/view?usp=sharing).
![ARehab screenshot 005]https://drive.google.com/file/d/0BwCMaGFBerAaT3Z5YzhjSG84UHJyMXJjRGtIVUhINTdlb0RR/view?usp=sharing).
![ARehab screenshot 006]https://drive.google.com/file/d/0BwCMaGFBerAaUHdQVnE4YUxpTkgxQ3ViTHlvb3F5ZkRLbU5Z/view?usp=sharing).

ARehab is at an early stage of development, therefore, only the source code and resources needed are distributed. The user interface is localized in Spanish, but i18n will be a feature that is in my TODOs list.

If you are considering to colaborate in the project or have questions, you can contact me by:
- email: jacobodeharo -at- gmail.com
- twitter: @jacobodeharo
- LinkedIn: https://www.linkedin.com/in/jacobodeharo
